sentence.Network_en: He goes to the podiatrist to have his bunions treated.
sentence.Network_cn: 他到足病医生那里去治他的拇囊肿。

sentence.Network_en: There are records of the King of France employing a podiatrist, as did Napoleon.
sentence.Network_cn: 有记载称,法国皇帝们曾经雇用足科医师, 例如拿破仑.

entry.def: A podiatrist is a person whose job is to treat and care for people's feet. Podiatrist is a more modern term for chiropodist .

means.word_mean: 1. a specialist in care for the feet

auth_sentence.content: Podiatrist Margaret Dabbs is the woman I trust with this laborious task, and she knows all the tricks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Podiatrist Margaret Dabbs is the woman I trust with this laborious task, and she knows all the tricks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Podiatrist Margaret Dabbs is the woman I trust with this laborious task, and she knows all the tricks.

auth_sentence.content: So Bludau referred Gavrilles to a podiatrist, whom he wanted her to visit once every four weeks, for better care of her feet.
auth_sentence.res_content: So Bludau referred Gavrilles to a podiatrist, whom he wanted her to visit once every four weeks, for better care of her feet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So Bludau referred Gavrilles to a podiatrist, whom he wanted her to visit once every four weeks, for better care of her feet.

auth_sentence.content: Most diabetic patients should have their toenails professionally cut by a podiatrist or a pedicurist trained by a podiatrist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most diabetic patients should have their toenails professionally cut by a podiatrist or a pedicurist trained by a podiatrist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most diabetic patients should have their toenails professionally cut by a podiatrist or a pedicurist trained by a podiatrist.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =foot,表示"足,脚"; 2. =child/education,表示"儿童"; 3. 引申为"教育"
